appetizer_menu_description: Asian style fried eggrolls stuffed with in-house smoked brisket and cheese. served with sweet chilli sauce￼
Pretzel, jallapenio cornbread and challa rolls with side of herbal butter. 2 of each
Cream spinach (cream cheese and spinach) with pickled jallapenios and artichoke hearts topped with pico served  with tortilla chips and croustini
lightly fried calamari, shrimp, jalapeño, bell pepper, bean sprouts
Bavarian pretzel topped with molten mozzarella, prosciutto (cured ham), beef bresaola (cured beef), jalapeño sausage, seasonal cheese, fruit, candy pecans, olives, cheese sauce, grain mustard
3 eggs cut in half (6 pieces) topped with bacon jam and garnished with chives
5 meatballs: ground beef breaded and lightly fried then toasted in the oven. Served in spicy tomato sauce, topped with mozzarella and accompanied with croustini
